nodes.text: The Queen of Air and Darkness
The Queen of Air and Darkness is the third adventure in the Dawn of Defiance campaign. It is written by Rodney Thompson and released on February 28, 2008.
The players investigate Darga the Hutt at the Cloud City Sabacc Tournament and confront him before they rush to stop Imperial forces destroying a Tibanna gas hauler.
The adventure shares its name with a book by T.H. White in the Once and Future King series; White's retelling of the Arthurian tale was a significant source of inspiration for the Original trilogy.
It's also the name of a sabacc card.
